subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: As the Mets’ David Wright nears a return from an injury that has sidelined him all season, a look back shows that such long absences from the game can be difficult to surmount in some cases, although not for Ted Williams.
snippet: As the Mets’ David Wright nears a return from an injury that has sidelined him all season, a look back shows that such long absences from the game can be difficult to surmount in some cases, although not for Ted Williams.
